message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product for a price that I think is very reasonable considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $900000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $850000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $880000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm confident that the product is worth more than $850000 to you, and I'm willing to give you a discount, but not quite that much.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, $880000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $860000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.

I can see that we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $865000. I think this is a fair price that balances our interests and gets you a great deal on the product. What do you say?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $860000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it, and I'm willing to compromise to reach an agreement.
